channel.title: Nat Bennet on Nicola Iarocci
channel.description: Recent content in Nat Bennet on Nicola Iarocci
channel.copyright: Produced / Written / Maintained by Nicola Iarocci since 2010

item.title: Write a lot
item.description:
Write a lot. This is alpha and omega of writing advice, the beginning and the end, and it’s that way for a reason– I don’t know anyone who’s good writing who hasn’t also put in serious hours.

– Nat Bennet
item.content:encoded:
Write a lot. This is alpha and omega of writing advice, the beginning and the end, and it’s that way for a reason– I don’t know anyone who’s good writing who hasn’t also put in serious hours.

– Nat Bennet
